links.title: Above the 40 - Stock Market Returns To Its Originally Scheduled Program
links.description: AT40 = 48.5% of stocks are trading above their respective 40-day moving averages (DMAs) AT200 = 52.9% of stocks are trading above their respective 200DMAs VIX = 14.6 (11.5% drop) Short-term Trading Call: bullish Commentary The (expected) plunge in the volatility index, the VIX, says it all...the stock market is ready to return to its originally scheduled programming.

messages.body: $AAPL Great summary of Saber Capital's 4Q17 Letter - long thesis for Apple:  https://investoralmanac.com/2018/02/18/saber-capital-4q17-letter-2017-review-apple-and-tencent/

links.title: Saber Capital 4Q17 Letter: 2017 Review, Apple, and Tencent - InvestorAlmanac
links.description: Saber Capital Management Letter to Investors: 2017 Review, February 15, 2018 In 2017, portfolio gained 30.7% gross (25.3% net) vs. S&P 500 gain of 21.8% 3 biggest drivers were Apple, Verisign, and Tencent; gained 46%, 50%, and 114% respectively in 2017 Selling Too Early It was a mistake to sell our bank basket (JPM and BAC).

links.title: Don't Be Dumb: Stock Prices Will Probably Be Higher in 10 Years
links.description: A cheery rendition of happy birthday is in order. This bull market just celebrated its ninth birthday. On Monday, March 9, 2009, the stock market hit a bottom. In the nine years since, Wall Street has rejoiced at enormous gains in the stock market that have surely made more than a handful profoundly wealthier this decade than they were last.
